fees.description: The transaction fees charged on the order transaction. Only present for Shopify Payments transactions.

flat_fee_name.description: Name of the credit card flat fee.

admin_graphql_api_id.description: Unique identifier for the resource in the GraphQL Admin API

type.description: Name of the type of fee.

credit_card_wallet.description: Information about the digital wallet used for payment

avs_result_code.description: Code indicating the AVS (Address Verification Service) result

buyer_action_info.description: Information about any buyer actions associated with the payment

credit_card_expiration_year.description: Expiration year of the credit card

credit_card_expiration_month.description: Expiration month of the credit card

cvv_result_code.description: Code indicating the CVV (Card Verification Value) result

credit_card_bin.description: First few digits of the credit card number

credit_card_company.description: Name of the credit card company

formattedGateway.description: The human-readable payment gateway name used to process the transaction.

created_at.description: Date and time when the transaction was created

location_id.description: ID of the location where the transaction took place

shop_url.description: URL of the shop where the transaction occurred

payment_id.description: ID of the payment associated with the transaction

processed_at.description: Date and time when the transaction was processed

total_unsettled_set.description: Total unsettled amount of the transaction

currency_code.description: Currency code of the shop amount

amount.description: Amount in the currency for presentation purposes

currency_code.description: Currency code of the presentment amount

source_name.description: Name of the source that initiated the transaction

test.description: Flag to indicate if the transaction is a test transaction

device_id.description: ID of the device used to process the transaction

message.description: Additional message or notes regarding the transaction

amount_set.description: The amount and currency of the transaction in shop

accountNumber.description: The masked account number associated with the payment method.

manuallyCapturable.description: Whether the transaction can be manually captured.

user_id.description: ID of the user associated with the transaction

parent_id.description: ID of the parent transaction if applicable

admin_graphql_api_id.description: Unique identifier for the resource in the GraphQL Admin API

receipt.description: Receipt information related to the transaction

error_code.description: Error code associated with the transaction

order_id.description: ID of the order associated with the transaction

gateway.description: Payment gateway used for the transaction
